question: Bolivia coup successful by tomorrow?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if there is a coup resulting in the removal of Bolivia's president (Luis Arce) from power for any length of time between June 26, 4 PM ET and June 27, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

President Luis Arce will be considered to be removed from power if he is forced to resign, is detained, or otherwise loses his position or is prevented from fulfilling his duties as President of Bolivia within this market's timeframe.

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Biden drops out before the Democratic convention?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if President Joe Biden officially announces his withdrawal or is confirmed to have withdrawn from the 2024 US presidential race before the start of the Democratic National Convention (DNC), currently scheduled for Aug 19, 2024. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No". 

In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent Joe Biden from continuing the race, this market will also resolve to "Yes".

The start of the DNC is defined as 12:01 AM ET on the first scheduled day of the convention.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Joe Biden or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Biden drops out before the Democratic convention?

question: DNC open convention?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the 2024 Democratic National Convention requires more than one ballot to determine the party's presidential nominee. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No". 

If a nominee is selected on the first ballot, this market will resolve to "No."

If there's a virtual roll call that confirms Biden as the nominee, this market will immediately resolve to “No”. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be the Democratic Party and official information from the DNC, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Switzerland vs. Italy - who will advance?
description:
This market refers to the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship match between Switzerland and Italy scheduled for June 29, 12:00 PM ET.

If Switzerland advances to the quarter finals this market will resolve to "Switzerland".

If Italy advances to the quarter finals this market will resolve to "Italy".

events.title: Switzerland vs. Italy - who will advance?

question: Ethereum above $3,500 on July 5?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for ETHUSDT 05 July '24 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) has a final “Close” price of 3,500.01 or higher. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETHUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETHUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Germany vs. Denmark - who will advance?
description:
This market refers to the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship match between Germany and Denmark scheduled for June 29, 3:00 PM ET.

If Germany advances to the quarter finals this market will resolve to "Germany".

If Denmark advances to the quarter finals this market will resolve to "Denmark".

events.title: Germany vs. Denmark - who will advance?

question: Will the match be a draw?
description:
This market refers to the Copa America 2024 match between Paraguay and Brazil scheduled for June 28, 9:00 PM ET.

If the match ends in a draw this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

question: Will Gretchen Whitmer announce presidential run before DNC?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Gretchen Whitmer, Governor of Michigan, announces that she is running for president of the United States of America before 12:00 AM ET on the first day of the Democratic National Convention, currently scheduled for August 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

For the purpose of resolving this market, an announcement by this candidate will be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution, regardless of whether they actually filed to run for president of the United States, or whether they actually file to run for president in the future.

If the DNC does not begin by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, and this candidate has not announced their intention to run, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements by this candidate (ex: via speech, social media, etc.) or their official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Democratic candidates announce run for president before DNC?
events.description: This is a market on whether Democratic candidates will announce their run for president before the Democratic National Convention.

question: Will Kamala Harris announce presidential run before DNC?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kamala Harris, Vice President of the US, announces that she is running for president of the United States of America before 12:00 AM ET on the first day of the Democratic National Convention, currently scheduled for August 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

For the purpose of resolving this market, an announcement by this candidate will be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution, regardless of whether they actually filed to run for president of the United States, or whether they actually file to run for president in the future.

If the DNC does not begin by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, and this candidate has not announced their intention to run, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements by this candidate (ex: via speech, social media, etc.) or their official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if J. B. Pritzker, Governor of Illinois, announces that he is running for president of the United States of America before 12:00 AM ET on the first day of the Democratic National Convention, currently scheduled for August 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

For the purpose of resolving this market, an announcement by this candidate will be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution, regardless of whether they actually filed to run for president of the United States, or whether they actually file to run for president in the future.

If the DNC does not begin by August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, and this candidate has not announced their intention to run, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements by this candidate (ex: via speech, social media, etc.) or their official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Democratic candidates announce run for president before DNC?

question: Will a Democratic Governor call on Biden to drop out?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any Democratic governor publicly states that Joe Biden should drop out of the 2024 presidential race before 12:00 AM ET on the first day of the Democratic National Convention, currently scheduled for August 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

Statements that the Democratic party should nominate another candidate other than Joe Biden will also qualify for a “Yes” resolution.

Statements that are hedged or express ambiguity, such as “We need to consider our options for the nominee” will NOT qualify for a “Yes” resolution. 

If the DNC does not begin by August 31, and any Democratic governor has not called for Biden to leave the ticket, this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements by Democratic governors or their official representative(s); however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Will a Democratic Governor call on Biden to drop out?

question: Will a Democratic Senator call on Biden to drop out?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any Democratic senator publicly states that Joe Biden should drop out of the 2024 presidential race before 12:00 AM ET on the first day of the Democratic National Convention, currently scheduled for August 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

Statements that the Democratic party should nominate another candidate other than Joe Biden will also qualify for a “Yes” resolution.

Statements that are hedged or express ambiguity, such as “We need to consider our options for the nominee” will NOT qualify for a “Yes” resolution. 

If the DNC does not begin by August 31, and any Democratic senator has not called for Biden to leave the ticket, this market will resolve to "No."

A senator will be considered to be a member of the party they caucus with.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements by Democratic senators or their official representative(s); however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Will a Democratic Senator call on Biden to drop out?

question: Gretchen Whitmer Democratic Presidential Nominee?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Gretchen Whitmer wins the 2024 nomination of the Democratic Party for U.S. president. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democratic Party sources, including https://democrats.org/.

Any replacement of the nominee before election day will not change the resolution of the market.

question: Will Biden announce resignation by July 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if President of the United States Joe Biden announces has resigned or will resign the presidency by July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If it becomes impossible for Joe Biden to resign or to announce his resignation (e.g. due to his removal from office by other means, etc), this market will immediately resolve to "No".

For this market to resolve to "Yes" it is only necessary Biden announce that he has or will resign. Whether he actually resigns will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US federal government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Biden announce resignation by July 31?

question: Will Biden finish his term?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden successfully finishes his term as President of the United States of America without any interruptions. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will not resolve "Yes" until the presidency is successfully transferred from Biden to another person at the completion of his term on January 20, 2025, or until Biden is sworn into the presidency again on that date.

The primary resolution source for this market is official information from the US federal government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Biden finish his term?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden successfully finishes his term as President of the United States of America without any interruptions. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will not resolve "Yes" until the presidency is successfully transferred from Biden to another person at the completion of his term on January 20, 2025, or until Biden is sworn into the presidency again on that date.

The primary resolution source for this market is official information from the US federal government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
